time_modal.title: Select a different time
time_modal.not_clicking: Not clicking on 'Set time' automatically assumes you've taken it now

pills.title: Pills and Pill Groups
pills.p1: Here you can manage the different Pills you usually take and want to have available in your selection screen.
pills.p2: You can use Pill groups for a better overview in your dropdown. Other than that, they don't have much use.
pills.p3: Pills can belong to a Group and can contain one or multiple of your tracked ingredients. On selecting, you can also decide between a whole or just half a pill.
pills.group_added_text: You can now add Pills to this group
pills.no_ingredients_text: Please add at least one ingredient to save your pill
pills.pill_added_text: You can now select this Pill on the main screen
pills.pill_deleted_text: This pill will no longer be selectable
pills.name: Name

ingredients.ingredient_added_text: The ingredient has been added for tracking. You may reference it in pills now
ingredients.title: Ingredients
ingredients.p1: Ingredients are the main purpose of this Application. Here you can enter what trackable ingredients your pills can contain, as well as your personal limit and how long this limit should be kept.
ingredients.p2: For example, a person with a body weight of 75kg should not consume more than 800mg of Ibuprofen within 6 hours:
ingredients.p3: Remember that you should always talk about these values with a professional, as personal limits and time frames can vary based on many factors.
ingredients.name: Name

export.title: Import and Export
export.p1: If you want to transfer your data to another device or want to have (or use) a backup, you can do so here
export.p2: If your local data is encrypted, your backup will also be encrypted, otherwise it will be in plain text. When importing an encrypted backup file, note that you will have to supply the password it was encrypted with, but from there on it will use the encryption settings of the new device.
export.p3: Manually editing the exported file can lead to permanent data loss.

export.title: Export
export.p1: Keep in Mind that only your Data will be exported (encrypted or unencrypted). Settings such as 'keep intake history' will not be transferred

import.title: Import
import.p1: Keep in Mind that importing the data will erase existing data (apart from your encryption settings)

security.encryption_enabled_text: Your data is even more safe now!
security.password_incorrect_text: Your current Password is required for confirmation
security.title: Security
security.p1: This Application may store sensitive data about your medication intake. Thus, security is of utmost importance to us.
security.p2: Which pills you have taken is only stored as long as it is necessary to track a potential overdose. These time limits are checked at startup or can be refreshed manually.
security.p3: All your Data is stored locally and can only be accessed by accessing your device.
security.p3b: If you are in private browsing mode, your data will be erased after you close the browser
security.p4: Additionally, you can protect your information using a password. It will e encrypted before saving it to disk and we only store it in your browser while you use the app (session storage). If you forget your password, your information cannot be recovered.
security.p5: You can also purge all your saved data
security.save_beyond: Keep my intakes saved beyond their expiration

delete.title: Are you sure?
delete.p1: You won't be able to recover deleted data
delete.p2: Items referencing this entry must be deleted or altered first.
